description: All the juice, citrus and tropical flavour of Faith, but even more sessionable at a lower ABV of 4%.
American hops give fruity, floral flavours, plus Australian Galaxy for a tropical boost.
Brewed using yeast, the finest hops and a specially selected amber malt that gives it a rich golden tone.
Easy drinking pale ale with notes of pear, creamy orange and a soft bitterness.
Refreshingly crisp pale ale with citrus/lemon notes.
Local Kent hops form the earthy, herbal base then dry-hopped with an aromatic dose of NZ hops.
Golden Ale, brewed with English Olicana hops. Aromas of sweet malted barley and subtle fresh hops.
Golden in colour, Mosaic hops give a fruity aroma and a refreshing smack of citrussy flavours.
Well balanced tawny bitter with full bodied malt and citrus hop notes.
Flavours and aromas of pine, peach, lychee and citrus, with a well balanced bitterness.
A hint of sweetness and caramel while Challenger and Styrian Goldings hops impart aroma and bitterness.
Dark, ruby treacle tones, hints of roast barley and beautifully hopped with a chocolaty aroma.
Light in colour with a creamy smoothness, it is a good example of a Pale Ale with a refreshing clean finish.
Deep amber colour, a light hoppy aroma and a rich and rounded malty taste to give a smooth and refreshing ale.
American hops provide a huge fresh burst of citrus flavours creating a very well balanced beer.
A punchy single hopped pale ale, packed with cascade.
Collab with Theakston. Easy drinking, malty with Citra and Cascade hops for a citrus finish.
A classic English bitter, copper coloured, well balanced, malty flavours and a smooth bitter finish.
A dark ruby beer with roasted notes and a smooth, creamy taste. A favourite of lovers of a good old fashioned mild.
A rich, sweet barley wine with an incredibly complex flavour profile. Brewed by appointment to the Kings Royal Lancers.
Rich dark beer brewed with four malts and a cocktail of hops. Deep malty base with dark chocolate flavours.
Aroma of tropical fruit and lime, with orange, lychee and sweet cereal on the mid palate. Clean firm bitterness.
Session pale ale for the post truth "citrus" generation.
Blonde coloured summer ale with citrus hop aroma.
Crystal and Cascade hops in the boil and dry hopped with even more Cascade give this beer a fruity punch.
Perfectly balanced, loving crafted English Bitter.
Special Belgian malt and a fruity mix of American and European hops.
Hop forward with citrus and pine, bitterness is balanced with caramel sweetness.
A pale, hoppy and frooty summer ale.
West Coast Pale - expect pine, tropical notes and a decent bitter finish.
Soft, pillowy, hazy pale from Manchester's finest.
Fruity aroma, gives way to an earthy bitter finish. Classic cask Golden Ale.
A crisp, amber coloured beer that makes a refreshing session ale.
Light in colour and taste, simply refreshing for summer.
Bramling Cross and Northdown hops make for a well balanced, full flavoured beer.
Milkshake IPA using Simcoe and Mosaic Hops for a citrussy smooth flavour (contains lactose).
A rich malty amber beer with aromas of tangerine and tangy citrus with a hint of orange peel.
A pleasing bitterness to finish and is relentlessly hoppy up front.
Brewed with gallons of local honey complemented by a generous portion of malt, wheat, hops, orange and spices.
Bursting with intense tropical and citrus flavours with toasted malt sweetness.
A faithfull recreation of Samuel Allsopp’s 200 yr old Burton IPA.
Same recipe as the classic Jaipur , but double dry hopped for a more punchy tropical fruit character.
Quality malt, with the aromatic fruitiness of a single English hop for balance.
Brewed with hop varieties to give a juicy, tropical flavour and aroma.
Citra, Simcoe and Mosaic create a kaleidoscope of bright citrus and fruit flavours, with a gentle, clean bitterness.
Full-bodied brown ale with a twist - tropical fruit flavours from American hops.
Perfectly balanced, toffee malt and fresh hop character.
West Coast-style IPA, showcasing modern American hop varieties including Columbus, Citra, Simcoe and Talus.
Full bodied, New World hopped IPA, tropical fruit flavours full on bitterness, earthy finish.
Classic ruby dark mild, smooth like velvet, sweet and creamy.
Grassy and herbal notes from English hops, boosted by Cascade in the dry hop.
Citrus hop aroma and smooth palate, balance finish using Target and Celeia hops.
Balanced and respectable brew with notes of toffee, vanilla and nuts.
Single hopped pale with Mosaic. Juicy flavours of tropical fruits, blueberries and papaya.
A traditional style English bitter, as hoppy as it used to be.
Malt character of caramel and lightly toasted biscuits shine through a light body, with gentle notes of pine and light citrus fruits.
Pine, spice and dark fruit aromas, with smooth caramel, biscuit on the palate.
Complex hop bill including Idaho-7 and Galaxy, summer berries and tropical.
Classic London Porter, smooth and robust with roasted malt notes of coffee and chocolate.
English style IPA.
Rich malt flavours make this a rounded chestnut best bitter.
Pineapple, orange and peach aromas with a light, wheaty body.
Mystic and Jester hops give classic blackcurrant and citrus aromas, that sets up for a fruity complex finish.
Resolution is late hopped with three American hop varieties for maximum flavour.
A highly sessionable bitter brewed using English grown hops.
A heady mix of mango juiciness, with a marmalade bite, and soft finish.
Zesty summer citrus and soft fruit flavours and a gentle, moreish bitterness.
Citrus and floral notes from the best Cascade hops with a crisp dry finish make this Golden Ale a fantastic session beer.
A classic dark and rich Porter, generously infused with single origin coffee beans.
Mosaic, Centennial & Citra hops give resinous notes of mandarin, and grapefruit. Crisp & clean finish with a soft bitterness.
Special English Ale uses chocolate malt to give it a deep copper colour and English hops give the ale a hint of berries.
NZ-grown Nectaron hops and US Citra to give intense aromas of citrus, peach, pineapple and passion fruit.
Natural pale ale brewed with malted pale barley, Chinook and New Zealand Southern Cross hops.
A mouth-watering taste of the tropics in a hotbed of fruity and citrusy hops.
Crisp IPA with citrus characteristics. Balanced malts, American Cascade and Summit hops.
An English IPA that packs more flavour with a three hop blend to create a real session thirst-quencher.
Pale Ale loaded with Citra and Amarillo hops providing massive amounts of tropical fruit with a clean finish.
Cascade, Columbus & Amarillo hops produce an intensely aromatic and resinous finish.
Balanced best bitter with depth of character. English hops for a subtle bitterness and American hops, the aroma.
Pale Ale loaded with Citra and Amarillo hops providing massive amounts of tropical fruit with a clean finish.
Full bodied, well-rounded and slightly sweet. Late hopped with Mount Hood.
